import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Afficher() { const payy=useSelector(data=>data.pays) return (

{payy.map((p,i)=>{ return })}
code name SurfaceArea Population Action
{p.code} {p.name} {p.SurfaceArea} {p.Population}
) }
